Name: Locus
description:
Locus is married with 4 children. He is a commercial farmer who grows bananas and maize on medium scale.He is a permanent resident of Ntungamo where his farm is located.

His produce is of good quality. However, they have been affected by heavy rains that wash away the fertile soils and drought that makes the soils dry and infertile.

To overcome these problems and to further produce improved yields he is seeking a loan to buy mulches and manure to make the soils fruitful and to attain improved yields that are marketable.

This will increase sales and help make his life sustainable.
